title: () Roses - 39 Carretera del Far
description: Free parking spaces along the road, view of the harbor. A bit noisy at night with the cars passing along. 15min walk from the city center

title: (17480) Roses - 36 Carrer de Pep Ventura
description: Easy parking in front of the market hall. In the mid of the center. Nothing for large mobile homes. Only for camper vans or similar. Two bakeries right in the corner.

title: (17480) Roses - 10 Carrer de Francesc Sunyer i Capdevila
title_short: (17480) Roses - 10 Carrer de Francesc Sunyer i Capdevila
description: Simple parking without height limitation. Not very tall. Good for visiting the city

address.street: 10 Carrer de Francesc Sunyer i Capdevila

title: (17480) Roses - 4 Carrer de Francesc Sunyer i Capdevila
title_short: (17480) Roses - 4 Carrer de Francesc Sunyer i Capdevila
description: Large underground parking. Near supermarket. Playground.

address.street: 4 Carrer de Francesc Sunyer i Capdevila

title: (17480) Roses - 44 Carrer Camí del Cementiri
description: Quiet street behind the Tapia cemetery in the Roses.

title: (17480) Roses - 45 Carrer Francesc Alegre
description: Very quiet battery parking, behind a stone wall. Close to houses but hidden and quiet. There are many parking lots but there are some that are uphill, so they are worth about 10 or 12 to sleep. There are almost never cars.

title: (17480) Roses - 13 Carrer Ponent
description: Large car park with no height barrier nr police station & sports centre in Roses.

title: (17480) Roses - 8 Carrer Pitarra
description: Car park at the top of the hill. nice sea view. quiet place

title: (17480) Roses - 39 Carretera Arenas
description: Earth parking near the parking lot of the municipal swimming pool. With a minimum of 4 shaded places under the very popular pines. ideal for a stopover or to visit Rosas 10 min walk from the city center and beach.

title: (17480) Roses - 4B Carretera del Far
description: Parking suitable only for vans (not for AC). 2m barrier. Perfect site with beach showers and a tap for drinking water. WATCH OUT! It seems that it is the meeting place for young people with music and zero consideration if there is someone staying overnight (even during the week) otherwise it would be perfect! We had to move to another area.

title: (17480) Roses - 4 Passeig Marítim
description: Dead end street on the edge of the seaside promenade. Center and shops 500 m. No signs prohibiting parking at the motorhome. Ideal location. We tested it for 3 nights in May.

title: (17480) Roses - 34 Carretera Arenas
description: Great spot opposite Police Station. Easy access to beach and shops. Gravel.

title: (17480) Roses - 49 Carretera Mas Oliva
description: Quiet to spend the night. Level ground. Quite busy during the day. Tennis Club at nearby sports facilities. We will have to get up early ...

title: (17480) Roses - 2 Carrer de la Caravel.la La Pinta
title_short: (17480) Roses - 2 Carrer de la Caravel.la La Pinta
description: Dead end quiet street where you can stand close to the sea. Ample parking space out of season. There are no prohibition signs for campers. The center is nearby. There is also room in the adjacent streets.

address.street: 2 Carrer de la Caravel.la La Pinta

title: (17480) Roses - 64 Ronda Miquel Oliva Prat
description: It is a free car park open 24 hours a day, except on Sundays from 00 a.m. to 4 p.m., when the market is installed. Gauge at 2.2m. There is a source of drinking water nearby. You can't camp, just sleep and take nothing outside

title: (17480) Roses - 103 Ronda de Circumval·lació
description: Parking almost flat everywhere. close to the road but helps out well if needed. possible that it is the parking of the garden center next door.

title: (17480) Roses - 3 Carrer Ausiàs Marc
description: On the heights and close to the coves of Roses. In the middle of nature. Close to a pretty residential area. Only for one or two Van. Breathtaking view of the surrounding wild nature.

title: (17480) Roses - 44 Carretera Arenas
description: Small lot behind the school. Uncrowded road at night, far from the ring road. 3 minutes from downtown and the beach. Quieter than other areas, considering school hours. The address is rather: Carretera de les Arenes (in Catalan), thus spotted on GPS like OSM. (Sophievan)

title: (17480) Roses - 5 Carrer del Comapedrosa
description: Free ground parking next to the beach and the citadel (Roses archaeological park). It is next to the promenade and there are many parking lots, if you take shade you sleep very well. There is height to enter, 2 meters or 2.20, I did not put it. a little busy with cars that leave the parking lot at night since it is very central but it is very good.

title: (17480) Roses - 22 Carrer Jordi de Sant Jordi
title_short: (17480) Roses - 22 Carrer Jordi de Sant Jordi
description: Small parking lot at the top of rosas with breathtaking views of rosas and empuriabrava

title: (17480) Roses - 1-5 Carretera Canyelles
description: Very nice view over the bay of Rosas. Parking facing the sea, no parking at night.

title: (17480) El Mas Mates -
description: Next to the river several AC. Without height limit or prohibitions. We spend a quiet night with our motorhome. The municipal passed by and told us nothing. No shadows and no services. 10 minutes walk from the beach. A loud noise by the cars of the ring road.

title: (17480) Roses - 15 Carrer de Joanot Martorell
description:
Free parking spaces in the street

 between the campsite and the car park (paid and limited to 2.10m) 100m from the beach. In the shade under the trees. No contraindication to stay the night.

name: Camping Joncar Mar
title: (17480) Camping Joncar Mar
description: Camping Joncar Mar – Bungalow Roses - Within the town of Roses, in a privileged area of ​​Costa Brava, 50 meters far from a beach characterized by its beauty and for its fine sand… The campsite Joncarmar is fully equipped with facilities and activities necessary because neither you nor your family find anything missing. All year opened

address.street: Carrer Bernat Metge, 9-10 - Camping Joncar Mar

title: (17480) Roses - 42 Passeig Marítim
description: Free parking 24 hours on the beach, in the seafront of Roses, with a height limit of 2 meters. Ideal camper face, or mini camper. It has public toilets 24 hours a day. There is a restaurant / bar next to the parking lot with very good prices.

title: (17480) Roses - 10 Carretera Canyelles
description: Parking in the land of the lighthouse of Roses, below the road. Some trees, view and sea access, next to a path by the sea. Not bad passage day but quiet at night. Steep access on a few meters but concreted.

title: (17480) Roses - 2 Carrer Canigó
description: Motorhome washing area.

title: (17480) Roses - 40 Carrer de Jacinto Benavente
description: Clay ground space next to the road and 500 m from the beach.

title: (17480) Roses - 41 Diseminado Aforess
description: A small square that begins as a dirt road and ends at olive fields. After the dirt road, only the passage for pedestrians is accessible. It is a little higher than the city, so you have a wonderful view of the city and the sea. It's very quiet, the dirt road can be reached without four-wheel drive, the car just mustn't be too wide, as the driveway is a bit narrow.

title: (17480) Roses - 17 Avinguda de José Díaz Pacheco
title_short: (17480) Roses - 17 Avinguda de José Díaz Pacheco
description: parking lane. For free. Off-season possible. Relatively calm. Great view. In the season baker nearby (30m). Great view.

name: Camping Salatà
title: (17480) Camping Salatà
description: In Rosas, in an incomparable location on the Costa Brava, near a beautiful sandy beach with clear, shallow waters, Camping Salatà is ideal for enjoying a pleasant family holiday.

title: (17480) Roses - 2 Avinguda de José Díaz Pacheco
title_short: (17480) Roses - 2 Avinguda de José Díaz Pacheco
description: Parking for 5 euros until 9am the next day, 100m from the beach which wasn't busy

name: Autocaravaning Park Roses
title: (17480) Autocaravaning Park Roses

title_short: (17480) Roses - 29 Avinguda del Clot dels Franquets Nord

Car parking.

title_short: (17480) Roses - 5 Carrer de la Roca Negra

title_short: (17480) Roses - 1 Carrer de la Punta Falconera

title: (17480) Roses - 126 Carretera Besalú Roses

title: (17480) Roses - 65 Diseminado Aforess

title: (17486) Castelló d'Empúries - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place for overnight stay

name: Camping Ampurdanés
title: (17480) Camping Ampurdanés
description: Campsite Ampurdanes. Small, rather authentic campsite. It could have been nice because in addition to the beach. a small pitch with electricity, and no hot water in the showers. I still find the price expensive.

title: (17486) Castelló d'Empúries - Camí de la Fanguera del Merdoset
title_short: (17486) Castelló d'Empúries - Camí de la Fanguera del Merdoset
description: Wonderful beachfront parking lot. Overnight stays are not permitted, but are tolerated. Maximum entry height of the vehicle: 2.1 meters. Bar at all entrances. Very peaceful and relaxing. Totally free and very large beach. Really nice, worth a stop.

address.street: Camí de la Fanguera del Merdoset

title: (17480) Roses - 182 Avinguda de José Díaz Pacheco
title_short: (17480) Roses - 182 Avinguda de José Díaz Pacheco
description: Coves area beautiful views and with few people, dead end with a roundabout

title: (17480) Roses - 65 Diseminado Aforess
description: Very pleasant and quiet place. Access requires a 4x4, enough ground clearance and good tires are required.

title: (17480) Roses - 6 Carretera de I'Estacio de Vilajuiga
title_short: (17480) Roses - 6 Carretera de I'Estacio de Vilajuiga
description:
This is supposedly an aire, but is in fact side of road parking. No facilities whatsoever,  but may be better than trying to wild camp in Roses, especially during the summer.
I went there twice, the second time some French campers were there so it is recognised. There is actually a cul-de-sac further down the parking road to the left and I stayed there as its quieter  and no through traffic except the farmers cars going down a dirt track.

title: (17486) Castelló d'Empúries - Camí de la Fanguera del Merdoset
title_short: (17486) Castelló d'Empúries - Camí de la Fanguera del Merdoset

address.street: Camí de la Fanguera del Merdoset

description: Near the beach, next to a block of buildings.

Nice view of Castello d'Empurias.
Nice, neat, modern campsite, aimed at holidays with your dog. (dog pool)
Charging points for electric vehicles available.
Closed in winter.

title: () Roses -
description: Place with a beautiful view. Probably the parking lot to the lookout point nearby. Very quiet and level space for about 2-3 buses. We only saw a prohibition sign for the road that leads down to the sea next door - driving through and camping is prohibited here.

title: (17487) Castelló d'Empúries - Carretera de la Rajolería
title_short: (17487) Castelló d'Empúries - Carretera de la Rajolería

title: (17480) Roses - Carretera Montjoi

title: (17480) Roses - 37 Carrer la Roca
description: Parking at the entrance to Montjoi, on the left. It's not very big but it's ok. No service. Overnight stay prohibited

title: (17480) Roses - Carrer de Gauguin
description: Quiet place next to a forest track. Very good views of the Golf de Roses, elevated site. Slight incline but no problem. Fit 2 vans.

title: (17487) Empuriabrava - 6 Passatge Port Primer
description: On the edge of the beach, calm at this time (January).

title: (17487) Empuriabrava - 15 Carrer Jonclos
description: Possibility to park day and night free of charge on the parking spaces in the direction of the track. beach 2 minutes away.

title: (17480) Roses - Carrer de Gauguin
description: Great view but during the day only, night prohibited

name: Camping Rubina Resort
title: (17487) Camping Rubina Resort
description:
Empuriabrava, Playa de la Rubina. Camping Rubina Resort.
Swimming pool 60x15 m, very good for swimming, gym well equipped and free, restaurants, grocery shop. At 300 m from the beach and at 15 minutes walking from Empuriabrava's center.

title: (17480) Roses - 5-1 Carretera a Montjoi
description: Parking on the side of the road, just where the descent begins to access the cove. Plain space and enter 2-3 ac well organized

title: (17480) Roses - 5-1 Carretera a Montjoi
description: Cala Rustella parking with easy access.

title: (17487) Empuriabrava - 5A Passatge Salins 4 Línea
description: Off season parking is allowed all over the street, I called the local police and they confirmed this.

title: (17487) Empuriabrava - 7 Carrer Cavall de Mar
description: Located at the harbor basin, no supply and no disposal. Right next to the tower of "Marina Estrella". Beach and shops within walking distance. Doctor's office for the PCR test 100 m. Bleached light at night.

title: (17487) Empuriabrava - 28 Carrer Salins 4ª Línea
description: Ample parking in a row next to the canal, unpaved, very quiet and not very crowded without OTA you can sleep without problems and good views when you wake up, AC without problem

title: (17487) Empuriabrava - 5B Carrer Salins 1 Línea
description: Huge parking lot right on the beach stayed here one night with other campers without any problems.

title: (17487) Empuriabrava - 61 Carrer Falconera
description: Parking to spend the night and day. The beach is only an 8 minutes walk, without any services. There are many similar places to this.

title: (17495) Palau-saverdera - Unnamed Road
description: 2 parking on 2 levels in the middle of olive trees. with a big oak for shade. it is the parking of the climbing site a little more hate. a small way to get there that is ok. parking access is a bit more rock and roll. ok for van but not bigger

title: (17487) Empuriabrava - 19A Carrer Creus
description: To advise, existing parking areas on all "carrers", 11 in total, parallel streets that allow access to houses along the channels. No bans for motorhomes, no services. Quiet and reassuring. If you own a kayak you can put it in the water and visit Ampuria Marina

title: (17487) Empuriabrava - 1 Carrer Carmençó
description: Laundromat open until 11 p.m./Several machine sizes 8/13/17kg as well as dryers.  detergent included in price

title: (17487) Empuriabrava - 1O Carrer Magraners
description: Parking in front of the beach, quiet and spacious, beautiful sunrise, the local police warned us to park in the back street, but you can spend the night.

title: (17487) Empuriabrava - 7 Carrer Muga-B
description: Parking next to a sailing school. Showers and toilets on the beach, bars and restaurants, cycle paths, walks in town, walks on the canals of little Venice.... kite-surfing and wind-surfing... superb location and landscape .

title: (17487) Empuriabrava - 16B Carrer Segre
description: 17 carrer segre, at the bridge, broken down, we slept without problem. Beach at 15 minutes, calm, shade and close to the canal.

title: (17487) Empuriabrava -
description: Multiple parkings in the Blue zone. It is not paid in low season. Near the beach and many shops. Promenade with many activities and parks. Be careful with the trees!

title: (17487) Empuriabrava - 17 Carrer Byblos
description: Parking for free camper without service. Although for a few nights in the quiet. About 800 m from the beach and the city. Thanks to the commune.

title: (17480) - 60 Diseminado Aforess
description: Hairy cove parking lot, next to the cove itself, has a beach bar, in September it is a very quiet place by the sea, possible limitations of access to very large motorhomes

title: (17487) Empuriabrava - 144 Carrer de la Marinada
description: Free and quiet parking to spend the day and night, a little busy but we slept well and 5 or 10 min walk from downtown and the beach.

name: Camping
title: (17487) Camping
description: "Laguna" campsite, with great amenities, swimming pools, on the beach and a lagoon, in a natural park, restaurant, mini-market, super clean sanitary facilities.

title: (17480) Roses - 64 Diseminado Aforess
description: Parking of the guinguette at the edge of the beach. Restaurant closed in June, quiet and flat ground. Space for 6 vehicles. In the morning you can be woken up quite early by the fishermen. Small track to get there.

title: (17487) Empuriabrava - 73 Carrer Montgrí
description: Montigri street perfect for visiting Empuriabrava and swimming, next to a cycle path

title: (17487) Castelló d'Empúries - 50 Carrer Aeroclub
description: Land parking located next to the Windoor (wind tunnel). It is calm.

title: (17495) Palau-saverdera - 2 Carrer Font Mallola

title: (17487) Empuriabrava - Unnamed Road
description: Upon arrival there is a tank that limits the height so that motorhomes do not pass

title: (17487) Empuriabrava - 66 Carrer Carlit

name: CAMPING MAS NOU

description: Castelló d'Empúries, 12 Carrer Mas Nou. Camping Mas Nou

title: (17487) Empuriabrava - Unnamed Road
description: Recent car park in natural area. beach 20 minutes walk.

title: (17487) Castelló d'Empúries - 50 Carrer Orlina
description: Lpg autogas available

title: (17488) Cadaqués - 42 Diseminado Afores
description: At the end of a paved road but overgrown with vegetation, only for a van. Magnificent view of Cadaqués, but no shade.

title: (17489) El Port de la Selva - GIP-6041
title_short: (17489) El Port de la Selva - GIP-6041
description: Parking 500 m from the abbey. Very beautiful view. Sometimes with a lot of wind!

title: (17489) Puerto de la Selva - Camí del Monestir
title_short: (17489) Puerto de la Selva - Camí del Monestir
description: A second smaller car park further from the first main car park. We spent time in our motorhome, accompanied by 3 small vans.

title: (17495) Palau-saverdera - Carrer Font Mallola
description: Area for three or four vans or a couple of not very long motorhomes. Near Mas Ventós, we discovered this somewhat hidden corner and quieter than the authorized area closest to the road. It is accessed by dirt track after passing a cattle crossing. Spectacular views.

name: Càmping Port de la Selva
title: (17489) Càmping Port de la Selva
description:
El Port de la Selva, GI-613.
Campsite 1 km from the beach, very friendly welcome. Very shaded, swimming pool, calm.

title: (17489) Puerto de la Selva - GIP-6041
description: Area with picnik tables about 8 of wood in one area and 4 of concrete in another area. The areas with toilets depend on the time of year, were closed in June.

title: (17494) Pau - Gl 610
description: Repsol petrol station where you can get fresh water.

title: (17489) La Selva de Mar - GIP-6041
description: On the way to San Pere de Rodes, a flat place on a hairpin with magnificent views of the town El Port De Selva and the Sea.

title: (17489) El Port de la Selva - GIP-6041
title_short: (17489) El Port de la Selva - GIP-6041
description: Extraordinary view, the climb is long the road is winding and wild cows on the road, but it is worth the trip. With only a van nearby and breakfast in the morning with happiness, view of Llançà and Port de la Selva impressive.

title: (17489) South Place. 5 la SORRA-2 2R - Carrer Cementiri
title_short: (17489) South Place. 5 la SORRA-2 2R - Carrer Cementiri
description: Parking at local cemetery. Good to start a bike tour

title: (17489) Puerto de la Selva - 8 GIP-6041
description: Just after the pass that leads to the monastery of San per de Rodes, at the beginning of the descent that leads to Figueres, at 50m there is a small path. Parking in front of the ruin, excellent view over the valley.

title: (17489) El Port de la Selva - 12 Carretera Selva de Mar
title_short: (17489) El Port de la Selva - 12 Carretera Selva de Mar
description: Follow direction La Selva de Mar GIV 6121, indication "Zona Esportiva" next to the skate park

title: (17494) Pau - 1 Carrer Concepció
description: Small car park where we stayed without problem during the day with our van. (Not suitable for motorhomes!) It is located in a small old village, very quiet and welcoming. There is a drinking fountain and it is also possible to walk to visit the area.

title: (17488) Cadaqués - 31 Carrer Trilla
description: Parking on the edge of Cadaques. Good for sightseeing and day trips to Cadaques. Also suitable for big ships.

title: (17486) Castelló d'Empúries - 1 Carrer Santa Clara
description:
Huge dirt parking lot without any prohibition.
ideal for spending the night and for visiting castello d empurie.
we spent the night there with our CC without worry.. no height barrier

title: (17486) Castelló d'Empúries - Carrer de la Carretera Fonda
title_short: (17486) Castelló d'Empúries - Carrer de la Carretera Fonda
description: Parking Cortal Park dels Aiguamolls. In the same car park, picnic area. Forbidden to stay at night

title: (17486) Castelló d'Empúries - 1 Carrer Rentador
description: Great avenue of the school with places all along, free, access to the immediate village, old wash-house at the end of the street at the top.

name: Camping l‘Arola
title: (17489) Camping l‘Arola
description: Camping l'Arola in El port de la Selva. Beautiful location by the sea near the beach and 500 m from the town center. Fairly flat land.

title: (17489) El Port de la Selva - 50 GI-612
title_short: (17489) El Port de la Selva - 50 GI-612
description: In front of the beach and next to a campsite. The police tell us that from 10 p.m. we cannot have dinner. Parking only, no sleeping there and 2m barrier.

title: (17486) Castelló d'Empúries - 5 Carrer Sant Francesc
description: Municipal and free parking of about 40 places, for vans and Camper well, for AC very fair if they are large, in front of the Farina museum and centered on the town. We spent a very quiet night

title: (17488) Cadaqués - 18 Avinguda Caritat Serinyana
description: Petrol station a bit expensive, but tap with non-potable water! little troubleshoot to do the dishes and shower by filling a can or the water tank, we filled about 50L also to do the tire pressure

title: (17489) El Port de la Selva - 4 Carrer la Mora
title_short: (17489) El Port de la Selva - 4 Carrer la Mora
description:
Small quiet car park with 5-6 spaces in the (partial) shade of several pine trees and in the middle of a quiet urbanization. We leave the camper here to go down to the dog beach, about a 10-minute walk away.
We did NOT spend the night here, we just parked for a few hours.

name: Camping Nautic Almata
title: (17486) Camping Nautic Almata
description: Nice camping on the beach, with all kinds of facilities, internet, games room, tennis, horse riding, car wash, minigolf, bungalows, sailing, swimming, squash, hairdresser, football, playground, embarcadora ramp, piers, bar, disco bar. Diving school, restaurant.

title: (17488) Cadaqués - 40 Carrer de l'Heretat
description:
Street in height of Cadaqués, which overhangs the city. Little passing.
Ok for van but too fair for camping car.

title: (17486) Castelló d'Empúries - S/n Carrer Alt Empordà
title_short: (17486) Castelló d'Empúries - S/n Carrer Alt Empordà
description: Free water Gas station Esclat, has a free water and air hose, apart from the super and the gas station

title: (17486) Castelló d'Empúries - 9 Carrer Santa Clara
description: Camping gas sales point

title: (17486) San Pedro Pescador - Carretera del Càmping
title_short: (17486) San Pedro Pescador - Carretera del Càmping
description: Several garden hoses available to fill the tanks or wash the vehicle free of charge. Drinking water

title: (17486) Castelló d'Empúries - 9 Carrer de Pau Casals
title_short: (17486) Castelló d'Empúries - 9 Carrer de Pau Casals
description: Water fountain and a small parking lot to rest. with a play area for children.

title: (17470) Sant Pere Pescador - Camí del Joncar
title_short: (17470) Sant Pere Pescador - Camí del Joncar
description: We have been in this parking lot for 3 nights (during the week). Large spacious area with nice views. Many boats, kayakers and jet skis since you can also do water sports here. There are marked places for motorhomes all over the area but you can park wherever you want. Enter, draw a ticket at the barrier for the entire site and on departure you pay at a machine. The barrier opens automatically. A few minutes walk to the beach. The grounds are maintained, there are trash cans everywhere and we also saw someone picking up trash. On the corner is a beach bar with toilets. We were not bothered by music from the bar. We did not use the toilets. No further services so you have to be self-sufficient. Please respect the location and be thankful that this spot is now available (paid) for campers/caravans in this region. For more information see photos.

title: (17489) El Port de la Selva - 2 Moll d'en Balleu
title_short: (17489) El Port de la Selva - 2 Moll d'en Balleu
description: Superb village, nice restaurant on the harbor further on towards the tip. car park at the port of la selva. free access (at least in the off season). for vehicle under 6m. for the longer ones, you can slightly overflow towards the net storage area.

title: (17486) Castelló d'Empúries - 19A Carrer del Pont
description: Free parking, ideal for visiting the city, not seen prohibition for the night but we did not stay there.

title: (17470) Sant Pere Pescador - Camí del Joncar
title_short: (17470) Sant Pere Pescador - Camí del Joncar
description: Parking at the mouth of the sea with streams. Possibility in big vehicles. Pick up your waste and your toilet paper.

name: Parking Mas Del Matà Aiguamolls
title: (17470) Parking Mas Del Matà Aiguamolls
description: Very large car park, not far from the Nautic Almata campsite. Easy to find thanks to the sign on the road. Limited to vehicles over 2m20. Road nearby so cars pass quite often but quiet place.

title_short: (17489) El Port de la Selva - 42 Carrer Mirador

El Port de la Selva, 50 GI-612.
Campsite Port de la Vall. Seaside. Clean, restaurant and grocery store open until 15/09.

title: (17488) Cadaqués - 25 Avinguda Victor Rahola
description: Super spot on the edge of a low traffic one-way road. 3 parking spaces. The top. 10 min walk from the port of Cadaques.

name: Wecamp Cadaqués
title: (17488) Wecamp Cadaqués
description: Wecamp - This campsite has just opened - it is brand new and absolutely outstanding ⭐️⭐️⭐️ It is the city where Salvador Dali's House is located - a beautiful place? Close to the beautiful town of Cadaqués and its promenade, all services, the beach and the town 5 minutes away.

title: (17493) Vilajuïga - GIP-6041

title: (17488) Port Lligat - 3B Cami de s'Alqueria
description: Parking area to spend the day, you cannot stay overnight, with easy access on foot by a short route that reaches Port lligat. In the parking lot there is a booth with a very friendly girl informing you about the area, from the information point you can take transport every 40 minutes to access Cap de Creus, walking is 5km.

name: Pàrquing Portlligat
title: (17488) Pàrquing Portlligat
description: Quiet parking lot right by the sea, restaurant hut next door where you can eat good fish. Rather flat country without any service. 300 m from Dali's House Museum. Kayak rental 100 m.

title: (17470) Sant Pere Pescador - 33 Carrer Afores

title: (17488) Port Lligat - 8P Cami de s'Alqueria

name: Camping La Gaviota
title: (17470) Camping La Gaviota
description: Small campsite with medium-sized pitches. It has a small market, bar and restaurant. Good cleaning of the bathrooms. Direct access to the beach. A bit too noisy in August. Valid for a few day stopover.

title: (17470) Sant Pere Pescador - Carretera de la platja
title_short: (17470) Sant Pere Pescador - Carretera de la platja
description: Parking near the campsite Gaviota. 1 night passed without problem in April. Right next to the beach.

title: (17488) Cadaques - 37P Cami de s'Alqueria
description: Safe secure parking up on the roadside five minutes walk to the beach and a good place to start hike go down the residential road this is a dead end and the gates at the end seem to be Dicio so there is no traffic.

title: (17493) Pujolar -

title: (17489) El Port de la Selva - Camí de Ronda
title_short: (17489) El Port de la Selva - Camí de Ronda

title: (17488) Cadaqués - 27 Carrer Punta de s'Oliguera

title: (17493) Vilajuïga - 29 Carrer Figueres

name: Camping las Palmeras Costa Brava
title: (17470) Camping las Palmeras Costa Brava
description:
Las Palmeras is a small, very quiet and comfortable campsite on the Costa Brava, where we are sure our clients will have an unforgettable stay. The facilities are designed especially families minded, where you will find everything necessary to make your stay enjoyable.

Another attraction of our campsite is that it’s situated next to the Natural Park of Aiguamolls de l’Empordà, a unique area where you can see the fauna and nature of this region. We are just a kilometer from the small, traditionally agricultural village of Sant Pere Pescador, far from the tourist crowds.

At 250 meters is a long sandy beach with shallow waters and monitored by lifeguards during the summer months which makes it really safe for children. You will find Beach bars for eating or having drinks during the day or to enjoy the nightlife scene. A privileged location for practising windsurfing and kitesurfing, with schools for those who wish to start practising these sports.

title: (17470) Sant Pere Pescador - 3 Carrer de Josep Pla
title_short: (17470) Sant Pere Pescador - 3 Carrer de Josep Pla
description: Esplanada near the Amfora campsite, I am not sure if it is possible to spend the night, I have slept here with a small van and no problem.

name: Camperpark Mas del Joncar
title: (17470) Camperpark Mas del Joncar
description: Located in the Aiguamolls de l'Empordà natural park, very close to the town (sant pere pescador), next to the river, near the sea. Site with electricity and water. Possibility of bathing in the swimming pool of the rural tourism house, if the occupation of the swimming pool is less than 18 people. You can have breakfast and dinner. Accepted animals. If you are looking for tranquility, this is your place. Very nice owners.

name: Camping L'àmfora
title: (17470) Camping L'àmfora
description: Large, spacious campsite directly on the long, wide sandy beach. Plots of various sizes and equipment. Very nicely laid out with lots of flowers. Sanitary facilities very large, new and very clean. Swimming pool, slides, 2 restaurants, large very well stocked supermarket. Great large leisure area with trampolines, pump track, climbing facilities for the kids.

title: (17470) Sant Pere Pescador - 1 Carrer Almogàvers
description: Parking 5 min from the beach, no prohibition or height restriction, we did not stay there overnight. Peaceful place ! There is also a cycle path on the side of the road.

title: (17470) Sant Pere Pescador - Unnamed Road
description: Very little frequented parking, 5 meters from the beach, very quiet !!

title: (17470) Càmping Les Dunes

title: (17470) Camping Balena Allegre

maximum influx of people
at night young people have fun there

Very kind and friendly.
The only place in the area.
Greetings from La Rioja!

title: (17470) Camping La Ballena Alegre
